name: My Quicktags
author: Thomas Norberg

sections.description: This a basic quicktag addition for “two” quicktags that I needed for my plugin and then some. But anyway its a html encoder and an easier way to generate shortcode for my MP3 Player Plugin for WordPress.
sections.installation:
1. Upload myquicktags.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. And thats it quicktags should show up.
sections.faq:
Why is this a good plugin?

Its more of a convenience thing because I was doing a lot repetitive things on my blog for updating and displaying the mp3_embed code. WordPress parses the “[” brackets and therefore all of my code that I was trying to help people with was not coming up with code but instead the actual mp3 player.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • (10/03/09) Added more options to mp3_embed button to coincide with MP3 Player Plugin.

1.0.1

  • (09/28/09) Made it to second release, afew added extras with css styling and some more javascript.

1.0.0

  • First release!

short_description: This plugin generates two quicktags on the post/page editors. One is the easy html encoder and the other is the easy mp3 code embed tag.
description: This a basic quicktag addition for “two” quicktags that I needed for my plugin and then some. But anyway its a html encoder and an easier way to generate shortcode for my MP3 Player Plugin for WordPress.

tags.mp3-player-plugin-for-wordpress-quicktag: mp3 player plugin for wordpress quicktag
